projects.description: For Kooditar Oy, I redesigned and re-implemented IESAF Ry's website to a more fresh, responsive look. The website runs on Wordpress.

I participated in creating a crowdfunding platform for FundYou Oy, overseeing customer communication and creating many of the platform's web views. Ultimately, the prototype was changed to a different one and the company's current platform is a different one.

projects.description: Helsingin Nuoret Kotkat Ry required a redesign of their website and a re-implementation of their camp registration system, requiring an integration for the Paytrail payment system and an automated logging of the camps and registered people to a database. As a lead developer of the project, I implemented the registration form, the Wordpress installation and most of the application's web views.
